snippet.title: Sovereign Syndicate Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Sovereign Syndicate launches on PC, January 15 2024.  
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1674920/Sovereign_Syndicate/

Explore the Victorian streets of London in this Steampunk RPG with tarot cards instead of dice, inspired by the greats like Disco Elysium, Arcanum and Baldurs Gate.  Interact with minotaurs, dwarves, centaurs, automatons and more in a gritty story of intrigue, betrayal and grey morality.

The game is currently in development by Crimson Herring Studios, a Canadian developer based out of Edmonton, Alberta.  

Visit our website
https://www.crimsonherring.com
